treatment-md.title: Polycydora Diez, Hernández, Reygel, Roosen & Artois, 2018, gen. n.
treatment-md.article-title: First record of Polycystididae (Platyhelminthes, Kalyptorhynchia) from Cuba, with the description of a new genus and five new species, and remarks and the description of one new species from Panama
